titles.title: Ensuring Veterans Access to Military Fitness Facilities Act of 2018

To amend title 10, United States Code, to permit the Secretary of a military department to grant veterans access to certain fitness centers under the jurisdiction of such Secretary, and for other purposes.
Ensuring Veterans Access to Military Fitness Facilities Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

bill.summary:
Ensuring Veterans Access to Military Fitness Facilities Act of 2018
This bill authorizes a military department to grant veterans access to a fitness center that is under its jurisdiction and operated by a geographically separated unit that is at least 100 miles from such unit's supporting base. Veterans currently only have access to on-base fitness centers.
